```{r}
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(tidyr)
library(zoo)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
here::here()
```


```{r}
pop<- read_excel(here("data","covid", "nst-est2019-01.xlsx"))
pop <- pop[9:59,]
pop <- pop[,c(1,13)]
colnames(pop) <- c("State", "Population")
pop$State<- sub('.', '', pop$State)
pop <- pop[-c(9,12),]
pop$State<- sub(' ', '_', pop$State)
pop$State<- tolower(pop$State)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(pop, file = here("data", "covid", "state_populations.rds"))
```
